meanings.definition: The act of forming a ring or circle.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the children enjoyed aneling around the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The wedding ceremony involved an aneling of friends and family.
meanings.sent3: The aneling of colorful ribbons created a beautiful decoration for the party.
meanings.sent4: The aneling of planets around the sun fascinated the young astronomer.
meanings.sent5: The aneling of dancers on stage mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: The process of heating and then cooling metal to make it more malleable.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith used an aneling technique to craft the intricate design.
meanings.sent2: Aneling is an important step in creating durable metal tools.
meanings.sent3: The aneling of the sword gave it a sharp edge for battle.
meanings.sent4: The aneling of the metal transformed it into a flexible material.
meanings.sent5: Proper aneling ensures the metal retains its strength.

meanings.definition: A small ring or loop used for attaching something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully threaded the string through the aneling on the necklace.
meanings.sent2: The keychain had a small aneling for attaching keys.
meanings.sent3: The aneling on the bracelet made it easy to adjust the size.
meanings.sent4: The aneling on the backpack broke, causing the contents to spill out.
meanings.sent5: He used the aneling on his belt to secure the tool pouch.
